issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This is a performance bug â€“ Balancer may pair a source datanode and a target datanode with different storage types. Fortunately, it will fail schedule any blocks in such pair since it will find out that the storage types are not matched later on.

The bug won't lead to incorrect results.
fields.summary: Balancer should not try to pair storages with different types

Thanks Chris for reviewing the patch.

I have committed this.
